# Conflict Rule 2 ## Adhere to the new life rule.
- [color=red][bold]Do not return to the location of your death[/bold][/color] during an ongoing situation or to collect your previous life’s items. - This rule applies only to [color=yellow]respawns[/color] (not to medical revivals or cloning). - Treat your new life as a [color=yellow]fresh start[/color]; do not seek revenge or act on information from your previous life.
[color=yellow][bold]Cloning and Memory:[/bold][/color] - If you are cloned by medical, you do not remember the last 15 minutes before your death—including the events, the engagement, and the people involved. - If you respawn as the same character (i.e., roundstart cloning), you remember nothing from the ongoing round except that you died; your memories are only up to your last cloner scan.
[italic][color=green]The New Life Rule helps maintain fairness and immersion by preventing players from immediately rejoining conflicts or recovering lost gear after death.[/color][/italic]
